item.title: Jack Black, Paul Rudd Take Their Snake-Movie Obsession Too Far in ‘Anaconda’ Trailer
item.description: Tom Gormican’s comedy reimagining of the 1997 horror film for Sony hits theaters on Christmas Day.

item.title: ‘The 40-Year-Old Virgin’ Turns 20: Judd Apatow on Controversial Scenes and the Studio Shutting Down Production
item.description: The filmmaker talks to The Hollywood Reporter about Seth Rogen’s regrets over the “You know how I know you’re gay?” jokes: “It was all done with a very positive spirit.”

item.title: Tim Robinson’s A24 Movie ‘Friendship’ Sets Streaming Debut
item.description: Paul Rudd and Kate Mara also star in Andrew DeYoung’s feature that hit theaters in May.
